Subskills.name: Sudden Winds
Subskills.description: Chance to increase the amount of tornados.

Subskills.name: Orbital Winds
Subskills.description: Spawn multiple tornadoes spiraling outwards from you.

Subskills.name: Tempest Mind
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of tornado.

Subskills.name: Windstorm's Wrath
Subskills.description: Chance to deal a critical strike with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Piercing Typhoon
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Flowing Spiral
Subskills.description: Chance to stun and knock targets up on hit.

Subskills.name: Absolute Tempest
Subskills.description: Conjure a tornado with increased size catching monsters in it till hitting terrain throwing any monsters caught in the air and causing them to deal area of effect damage upon landing.

Subskills.name: Punishing Tempest
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Tempeststep
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using tornado.

Subskills.name: Afterflow
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional tornado.

Subskills.name: Storm Growth
Subskills.description: Summon a static tornado growing in size and gaining increased damage over time eventually bursting into small tornados in all directions.

Subskills.name: Splitting Cyclone
Subskills.description: Tornado splits in size and halves on size and damage on hit.
